Hey everyone,
I'm looking for a female roommate to share a beautiful semi-furnished 2BHK in a gated villa community. A room with a dedicated washroom is available to occupy. 
Rent: 11k (including maintenance)
Deposit: 40k
Ready to occupy from 21st October.
Location: Reliaable Lifestyle Layout, Kaikondrahalli 
https://maps.app.goo.gl/Nsu7xWJ1prdjazZt5
The flat is very well ventilated and gets abundant sunlight. There are also no buildings nearby blocking the light and air. The locality is very peaceful and has greenery all around.
My ideal flatmate would be someone who is responsible, keeps things clean, and prefers peace and quiet. If you think you fit the bill, please DM!
